channel.title: Would like to make an animated banner for your server
channel.description:
i just started working with animating banners and id like to make a couple to improve my skills, tell me what youd like on it ect liek a pic or whatever
here is my second banner i ever made:
[IMG]http://i52.tinypic.com/2w6to1y.gif[/img]
just words but I can do alot more it'll take me bout 30 minutes per banner Just doing this for fun ^.^

ediy: and everyone knows you jsut trying to get your post count neways. :s[/quote]

Not to hate or anything…

but

  1. why would thomas need to intentionally raise his post count more?
  2. Post this on MITB honestly…
